DOC.brief_summary: The goal of this study is to determine the effectiveness of a general intervention that includes encouragement of physical activity and healthy living habits of officers and permanent staff in the IDF
DOC.brief_title: The Influence of an Intervention Program on Altering Health Behavioral Patterns Among IDF's Staff
DOC.criteria: IDF'S staff member Age >26 One or more risk factor Cardio vascular condition Respiratory disease Other healthy conditions according to the physician's decision
